title: What happens to the Usernames of Banned Accounts?
body:
Hiya :)

I am just curious as to what happens if you account gets banned and you make a new one, but you really love your original username? Can you send a ticket to transfer/use the username or do you have to wait the 18 months (or 36 or whatever number) for it to become available?

This is just out of curiosity :) I have no intention of getting banned xD

Thanks ‚ù§

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: Nope, you have to wait for it to be wiped by the name clears.

Thanks :D

Now my curiosity is satisfied :)
Honestly not sure on this one. Your best bet is probably just to submit a ticket and ask, that way if it's possible you can get it done, and if not you'll know how long you have to wait.
